attributes.action: give the go ahead for DUDLEY MOSQUE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the dudley mosque should be given the go ahead to be built....i don't see why it should be dragging this long!  do a good deed, say yes for the dudley mosque.

rejection.details: This is an issue for your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
